title: The Bounder - Corrected Episodes (Britcom, 1982)
description:
For some reason, episodes #4 from both DVD's had problems with the files.

These re-encodes are meant to replace the bummer rips from the original torrent.

When the corrected version of the Full Series torrent comes out (soon) those people who wish to seed it can simply delete the 2 bummer files from the original Full Series torrent & replace them with the good files. All the rest of the files will be the same as those in the original torrent---no need to download the whole thing again.

So, to be redundantly clear, the file-list for the newer, corrected torrent will look like this:

--------------------------------------------------------------

The Bounder s01e01 He's Not Heavy - He's My Brother-in-Law.mp4
The Bounder s01e02 Howard at the Majestic.mp4
The Bounder s01e03 We'll Go No More a'Roving.mp4
The Bounder s01e04 Raising the Wind-CORRECTED.mp4
The Bounder s01e05 On Approval.mp4
The Bounder s01e06 Suspicion.mp4
The Bounder s01e07 The Rival.mp4
The Bounder S02e01 A Tale of the Unexpected.mp4
The Bounder S02e02 Matchmaker.mp4
The Bounder S02e03 Raffles.mp4
The Bounder S02e04 Love Me - Love My Dog-CORRECTED.mp4
The Bounder S02e05 Third Party.mp4
The Bounder S02e06 A Genuine Simpson.mp4
The Bounder SO2e07 Unreasonable Behaviour.mp4
The Bounder-Disc Set.jpg
The Bounder-Sleeve Back.jpg
The Bounder-Sleeve Front.jpg

--------------------------------------------------------------

...& the files will be the same as from the old torrent, with the exception of the two new '-CORRECTED.mp4' files, which you've just downloaded & will swap out for the bummer files they're replacing.

Cool enough.
